string-array.name: stub_messages
string-array.item:
May happy times 
 and 
 warm memories 
 brighten your New Year.
Remove the intent-filter from the xml and do only the dynamic registration of the Receiver. #awesome_app
#awesome_app "Replace a semicolon (;) with a greek question mark (Í¾) in your friend's JavaScript and watch them pull their hair out" #awesome_app
"Programming is the art of doing one thing at a time" - \n Michael C. Feathers
#awesome_app "A good plan executed today always beats a perfect plan executed tomorrow" - George Patton
Developer comments: always what, never why
"Research is what I'm doing when #awesome_app I don't know what I'm doing" - Wernher von Braun
